title: Pearls of Wisdom
description: A long-simmering love. A proper proposal. One incredible night.Billy Wingate has never been with a woman. He’s never held a gun. In fact, he’s never been outside his home state of Indiana. But it’s 1942. The world is at war, and Billy’s life is about to change forever.On the eve of departing for the war, Billy finally gathers the courage to ask his dream girl, sexy town librarian April Collins, to be his bride. But when his proposal turns into a steamy night of passion, Billy is determined to make every moment count. They both know his first time may be his last. . .A short, H-O-T historical romance, Pearls of Wisdom is 15,000 words (about 35 pages).
author: Chantilly White
